title: Mark Sanchez Breaks Silence to Pay Tribute to Former New York Jets Teammate Nick Mangold
summary: Mangold died Saturday at age 41 of complications from kidney disease.

title: Norway Leads Global EV Adoption
summary: With sales continuing to thrive in many countries, the global market for battery electric vehicles (BEVs) surpassed the 10 million annual sales mark for the first time in 2024, with sales up nearly 10 percent compared to 2023. title: Can U.S. Hydropower Compete in a New Energy Era?
summary: The United States has long used hydropower, which is now the country’s largest source of renewable energy, for electricity production. title: US sanctions threaten major blow to Russian oil groups Rosneft and Lukoil
